&reftitle.install;
In order to build this extension yourself you need the libuuid library and header files to be installed on your system.
You have to run configure with option --with-uuid to build this extension.
configure looks for the library and header files under the default path prefixes /usr and /usr/local. If libuuid was installed using a different path prefix on your system you'll have to pass it as argument to the --with-uuid option.
